definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to stay (at a hotel etc during a trip)

sentences.english: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 我又用没药，沉香，桂皮，薰了我的榻。

sentences.english: Maitreya couch General larger body, waist and no waist and two types.
sentences.chinese: 弥勒榻一般体形较大，又有无束腰和有束腰两种类型。

sentences.english: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 我又用没药，沉香，桂皮熏了我的榻。

sentences.english: She threw the note into a wastebasket, and fell fast asleep on a couch.
sentences.chinese: 她把便条扔进字纸篓，倒在榻上就睡熟了。

sentences.english: He was lying prone on the couch, fast asleep.
sentences.chinese: 他俯卧在长榻上，睡得正香。

sentences.english: Nothing is more common than a cart or a truck at the door of a hostelry.
sentences.chinese: 一个客店门前停辆榻车或小车原是件最平常的事。

sentences.english: On a table by the side of the couch lay a mighty scimitar of steel.
sentences.chinese: 榻边的桌上摆着一柄威武的钢制弯刀。

sentences.english: In bed sleeping is my wife.
sentences.chinese: 在榻上睡得正香的才是我妻子。

sentences.english: Ta combo furniture set for Muji is also in the stores in both Japan and China.
sentences.chinese: 为无印良品设计的家具榻组合已投放日本和中国市场。

definition: warm room/warm partition of a room
praying mat (Buddhism, made of woven cattail)
